articles.description: Looking to capitalize on the potential of live-stream shopping, Instagram's gradually building out its streaming tools and options.
articles.content: This could be a valuable addition Instagram has added a new option to schedule upcoming IG Live broadcasts in the app, with users then able to tap through to get a reminder notification on the day of… [+2580 chars]
